short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add URLs to Web2Doc - a read-later service

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a companion to Web2Doc - a personal read-later service that saves web pages as articles and sends them to Kindle, Dropbox and to a private RSS channel. The extension requires a Web2Doc endpoint URL and an Web2Doc key in the settings.
